1000034502.title: 2 States
1000034502.description: Based on a novel by Chetan Bhagat; North and South India come together in this whirlwind romance between a Punjabi boy and a Tamilian girl.

1000059189.title: Raja Rani
1000059189.description: John and Regina get married only to please their parents but are unhappy. However, things change when they find out about each other's pasts.
1000059189.contentProvider: Fox Star Studio India Private Limited
1000059189.cpDisplayName: Fox Star Studio India Private Limited

1000074190.title: Hero
1000074190.description: A gangster's son kidnaps the daughter of the Chief of Police, as her father has some crucial evidence. While the police chase the two, love blooms between them.

1000081352.title: Bangalore Days
1000081352.description: Three cousins - Divya, Kuttan and Arjun - have always dreamt of living in Bangalore. When they get there, they end up discovering their true selves.

1000084315.title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
1000084315.description: Crown Prince Yuvraj Vijay Singh and his doppelganger, a carefree stage actor, Prem Dilwale's lives get entangled in a royal battle of romance and deceit.

1000091195.title: Premam
1000091195.description: George, a teenager, loves the idea of being in love. This dream seems to be within his reach in his school days and even in his college days, but it fails to materialise. However, all is not lost yet!

1000093421.title: Sanam Re
1000093421.description: An unfortunate event separates a much-in-love couple. However, fate gives them a second chance at happiness. Will luck favour them now?

1000172465.title: O Kadhal Kanmani
1000172465.description: Aditya and Tara fall in love and decide on a live-in relationship. However, their perception of marriage changes when they meet an old couple in love.
1000172465.crisp: Scenes of Intimacy, Some Mature Content

1000232258.title: Fidaa
1000232258.description: Varun, an NRI medical student, falls in love with Bhanu, a village belle. However, their chalk-and-cheese personalities create obstacles for them.

1000235527.title: Ispade Rajavum Idhaya Raniyum
1000235527.description: Gowtham suffers from anger issues and falls in love with Tara, an independent, practical girl. Time forces them to make tough choices. Will they part ways?
1000235527.crisp: Some Scenes of Intimacy, Some Drug Use, Action Sequences

1260009879.title: Nuvvu Naaku Nachav
1260009879.description: Venky, an unemployed youth, heads to Hyderabad to attend a wedding. A brief vacation gradually turns into something more as the soon-to-be bride falls for him.

1260014808.title: Arjun Reddy
1260014808.description: A short-tempered yet brilliant young medical surgeon immerses himself in drugs and alcohol when his lady-love is forced to marry someone else.
1260014808.crisp: Violence, Coarse Language, Some Drug Use

1260026183.title: Geetha Govindam
1260026183.description: Don't believe in love at first sight? Vijay and Geetha's hilarious love story will reinstate your faith in romance.

1260054414.title: Arjun Varma
1260054414.description: A surgeon with a nasty temper turns to drugs and alcohol when his girlfriend is forced to marry another. But there's more to this love story than meets the eye.
1260054414.detail: Strong sexual content, Drug usage, Strong violence, Mild sexual references, Some coarse language

1260102913.title: Heropanti
1260102913.description: To trace down his runaway daughter and her lover, Chaudhary kidnaps their friend Bablu. Chaos ensues when Bablu falls for Chaudhary’s younger daughter, Dimpy

1260118054.title: Rocky
1260118054.description: Rocky is a common young man whose life turns 360 degrees and makes him a deliverer of vengeance.

1260119494.title: Bidyarana
1260119494.description: Disowned by his father, Siddhamahavir grows up to be a fearless rouge. Eventually, he falls in love with Mithi, but his identity puts the relationship at stake.

1260123526.title: Sita Ramam
1260123526.description: On a letter-delivering task, Afreen learns of a 20-year-old romance set amidst a war. Her quest to trace the lovers makes her embrace humanity beyond borders.

1260126989.title: The 100th
1260126989.description: After meeting on a dating site, Purab and Malvika plan a special date night. Soon, the casual hook-up blossoms into love as past stories come to the surface.
1260126989.crisp: Mature Theme, Scenes of Intimacy, Sexual References, Some Coarse Language

1260132193.title: Deewana
1260132193.description: A grieving widow Kajal crosses paths with Raja, who falls head over heels in love with her. But chaos ensues when her husband Ravi returns from the dead.
